entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:21 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 08:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 4.0°C
Wind: SW 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Rain or snow. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early in the morning then changing to snow mixed with rain late in the afternoon. Fog patches developing early in the morning and dissipating in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
